name: Pew Pew Recoil
description:
Downloadable versions are available below.

Pew Pew Recoil is a shooter platformer where your guns have massive recoil, which you must use to navigate the levels while also dealing with enemies. It takes elements of classic NES platformers like MegaMan and Ninja Gaiden, modernize them, and adds a unique twist in the form of the recoil physics.

You play as a prototype combat robot, and must complete level upon level of tests to prove your worth. Although these tests start out easy, they become increasingly difficult, and you must use your wits, your skills, and all of your arsenal to overcome them.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim
  • Left Click to shoot
  • Right Click to scope when using the sniper rifle.
  • F to Fire Rockets
